subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Arnaud Clement and Michael Llodra bought France one more day, beating the twins Bob and Mike Bryan to close the gap to 2-1 and force the Americans to win it on Sunday.
snippet: Arnaud Clement and Michael Llodra bought France one more day, beating the twins Bob and Mike Bryan to close the gap to 2-1 and force the Americans to win it on Sunday.
